Summary: Sighting in Georgia 1973 or 74-Glowing Saucer Like
divs: Sighting DetailsThe witness in this case failed to provide a narrative description of the eventin this section. This FI sent an email to witness requesting a written personalaccount and a sketch which was received at MUFONGA on 10May02. Witness now livesin the state of Minnesota. See details in section below.Tom Sheets-SD MUFONGA
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Macon
There were no other sightings in Macon on or around November 30th 1972
